page.title: 19SCHOOL IN THE PRESENT DUNLOP
page.content: IN THE YEAR OF 1985 DUNLOP PRIMARY SCHOOL WAS 109 YEARS OLD.ACROSS FROM THE SCHOOL ARE THE HUTS WHICH WERE BUILT ABOUT 4 YEARS AGO.THE HUTS HOUSE 2 CLASSES AND ARE GAS HEATED.THE SCHOOL BUILDING IS COAL HEATED AND THIS CAUSED A LOT OF PROBLEMS DURING THE MINERS STRIKE.AS DUNLOP IS NOT VERY BIG THERE ARE NOT A LOT OF CHILDREN AND THE CLASSES ARE COMPOSITE.THE SCHOOL NOW HAS TWO COMPUTERS ONE DONATED BY THE{P.A. SCHOOL WORK CONSISTS OF COMPUTER STUDIES,NUMBER,MATHS,LANGUAGE,HISTORY, GEOGRAPHY AND PROJECT WORK.PROJECT WORK INCLUDES UNIT STUDIES, READING FROM A NOVEL AND ENVIROMENTAL STUIDES. AS WELL AS THIS CHILDREN ALSO WORK IN EXPRESSIVE ART, GYM, DRAMA,MUSIC SEWING AND HANDCRAFT. {P.A.}STANDS FOR PARENTS ASSOCIATION.
